articles.description: Cyril Abiteboul's departure from Renault's rebranded Alpine team was not widely expected - but don't be surprised if he turns up in F1 again soon.
articles.content: The rate and pace of change at Groupe Renault has been nothing short of breath-taking since former Seat CEO Luca de Meo (also an ex-Fiat head honcho, who brought the 500 to market) assumed the top jo… [+5690 chars]

articles.title: easyJet cancels all holidays until March as lockdown travel rules continue - Metro.co.uk
